articles.author: Kate Gibson
articles.title: Carnival says crew on quarantined ship will get long vacation
articles.description: About 1,000 workers will get two months of paid time off after serving on the quarantined Diamond Princess.
articles.content:
Crew members aboard a ship operated by Carnival's Princess Cruises that is quarantined off the coast of Japan because of a coronavirus outbreak on the vessel will receive an extended vacation once their ordeal ends. 
More than 1,000 workers on the ship have … [+2069 chars]

articles.author: Emily Tillett
articles.title: O'Brien says Phase One trade deal will be impacted by Coronavirus
articles.description: "As we watch this Coronavirus outbreak unfold in China, it could have an impact on how big, at least in this current year, the purchases are," O'Brien said.
articles.content: National Security Adviser Robert O'Brien says that components of the long-awaited trade deal with China will likely be impacted by the Coronavirus the death toll continues to climb in the region.  In a conversation with "Face the Nation" moderator Margaret Br… [+5554 chars]

articles.author: CBS News
articles.title: Stocks rise on solid earnings and a dip in virus cases
articles.description: The rise extends a rally as investors focus on strong earnings reports and a drop in new virus cases in China.
articles.content: U.S. stocks marched higher in early trading Wednesday and extended a rally as investors focus on the latest batch of mostly solid corporate earnings. A drop in the number of new virus cases in China also bolstered hopes that the economic impact of the outbrea… [+1735 chars]

articles.author: Audrey McNamara
articles.title: Cruise ship with no reported coronavirus cases shunned amid fears
articles.description: The ship, carrying more than 2,000 passengers and crew, is now heading to Cambodia.
articles.content:
A cruise ship has been barred by several countries amid fears of the global coronavirus outbreak. The cruise line, however, has adamantly denied there are any confirmed cases of the virus on the ship.
It is now heading for Cambodia, where its more than 2,000… [+3620 chars]

articles.title: "We're definitely not prepared": Concerns raised about Africa's coronavirus readiness

articles.author: CBS News
articles.title: Spread of virus slows in China but death toll keeps climbing
articles.description: With clusters of the disease bubbling up outside China, the biggest concern is that many cases could still be undetected around the world.
articles.content: Global health officials have warned the coronavirus outbreak that has killed more than 1,100 people and sickened about 45,500 could get worse before it gets better. As of Tuesday, there were only two clusters of the virus outside of China; a significant one o… [+1531 chars]

articles.author: CBS News
articles.title: Coronavirus quarantine ends for Americans evacuated from China
articles.description: A federal quarantine has ended for nearly 200 Americans who were evacuated from China. Officials said no one from the group had coronavirus. Carter Evans has the latest.
